ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 7 inch LCD Screen, 4ch video input and 2ch video output, 4ch audio input and 1ch output, 4ch alarm input, RS485, RJ45 interface, 2 USB2.0 ports
1/4" CMOS 420TVL, 3.6mm lens, 24pcs IR LEDs, 20M night vision
RJ-45 Port (10/100M) and RS485 Port
18m BNC cables
Menu languages: English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Spanish, Japanese, Russian, French, German, Portuguese, Turkish, Polish, Romanian, Hungarian, Finnish, Persian, Thai, Greek, Vietnamese
ProductInfo.Name: BW Complete DVR Security System with 4pcs Cameras and Built-in 7 Inch LCD Screen - Black
